Class Camera

java.lang.Object
  GameObject
      Camera

public class Camera
extends GameObject

Camera represents the camera player in MazeRunner.

This class extends GameObject to take advantage of the already implemented location functionality. Furthermore, it also contains the orientation of the Camera, ie. where it is looking at.

All these variables can be adjusted freely by MazeRunner. They could be accessed by other classes if you pass a reference to them, but this should be done with caution.

Author:
Bruno Scheele

Method Detail

calculateVRP

public void calculateVRP()
Calculates the View Reference Point (VRP) of the camera. The VRP of the camera is set to be just 1 in front of the current orientation of the camera. This makes it easy to create a first-person view setting, since it always looks in front of the player.
